DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize , single-blind , active drug control multicenter clinical research study would enrol total 2100 AMI patient undergo percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) one three antithrombotic regimen : bivalirudin alone , unfractionated heparin alone , unfractionated heparin plus glycoprotein IIb/IIIa inhibitor . All enrolled patient would followed-up 30 day , 6 month , 1 year . The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety bivalirudin AMI patient DES .
